price: Por certo, vós e o que adorais, além de Allah, sereis o combustível da Geena; nela, ingressareis.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
